title: A review of the true nature of schisme, with a vindication of the Congregationall churches in England, from the imputation thereof unjustly charged on them by Mr D. Cawdrey, preacher of the Word at Billing in Northampton-shire. / By John Owen D.D.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
publisher: Printed by Henry Hall printer to the University, for Thomas Robinson.,
notes: A defense of his "Of schisme" in reply to "Independencie a great schism" by Daniel Cawdrey.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
